attributes.action: Hold to account both the incompetent regulatory bodies and financial houses that are responsible for the current financial crises.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British people are paying a high price for the greed and incompetence of financiers and the permissive regulatory regime that allowed this mess to get out of control.

We demand that unilateral action be taken to stop further abuses and that an investigation be held into whether individual directors are culpable.

Strong and swift action should be taken against individuals that were incompetent or simply abusing the rules. 

Furthermore, any bail outs should be conditional on return of public moneys, in the form of long term loans, much like a reverse private finance initiative.  

All financial instruments that are designed to act  against the good of the wider community should be banned.

All guilty senior bankers and their regulators must demonstrate contrition, in the Japanese fashion, on prime time television, preferably when children are watching.
